sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Libtool
sect2.para: (Dernière vérification effectuée auprès de la version &libtool-depversion;.)
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, nm, ranlib, strip Coreutils: cat, chmod, cp, echo, expr, hostname, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, rmdir, sleep, sort, tr, uname, uniq Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0 Glibc: ldconfig Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info
